author: dzuolo
body: #### PR description: Changes to OnlineBeamMonitor DQM Client - Moved the content of `TrackingHLTBeamspotStream` and `onlineBeamMonitor` folder to a single folder `OnlineBeamMonitor` - Moved BSChoice plot from TH1 to TProfile for better run-to-run comparison - Changed era modifier - Changed unit test to use more recent run (346508) from LHC pilot beam (October 2021) #### PR validation: Validated with: ```cmsRun DQM/Integration/python/clients/onlinebeammonitor_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py unitTest=True``` which produce the new plot: #### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR: This is not a backport and no backport is needed FYI: @francescobrivio @gennai @mmusich
title: Changes to OnlineBeamMonitor DQM client and plugin
